title: What is the answer of a-b(c-d) =? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thre are no answers as you just have one equation with 4 variables. But if for example you knew that b=2,c=4,d=3 then you could rearrange the equation to make a the subject: a=b(c-d) Then a would = 2(4-3) = 2
a-bd+bd; this is an equal expression of what you wrote and if you plug in the same values for a, b and d on both sides you will get the same results
